document_data.name: Forgewraith
document_data.mainbody: '''Forgewraiths''' were a type of [[undead]] that arose from one or many [[humanoid]]s, usually [[evil]] in the former case, meeting their demise due to intense heat or flames in an industrial area. Most were an amalgamation of multiple weaker spirits, but those who arose from a single evil humanoid retained a soul and personality, much like a [[ghost]].
document_data.Personality: Forgewraiths delighted in consuming their enemies with fire and pain. Those that were born from a single humanoid had higher goals and could speak the languages they knew in life.
document_data.Abilities: [[Magic]]al fire did minimal damage to forgewraiths, while non-magical fire did no harm to them.
document_data.History: Following [[Mount Hotenow]]'s eruption in [[1451 DR]],  forgewraiths could be found within the [[Shadowfell]]'s reflection of it.

Ecology.Habitats: Beyond [[Toril]], forgewraiths were commonly found on the world of [[Eberron]].
